alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Hudspeth (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued March 12 at 1:09PM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THE FRANKLIN POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR ADDISON ALVAREZ, WHITE, FEMALE, 11 YEARS OLD, 5 FEET 3 INCHES, 100 POUNDS, BLONDE HAIR, BLUE EYES, AND LAST SEEN WEARING A GRAY HOODIE, RED PAJAMA PANTS, AND WHITE NIKE AIR ONES WITH A PINK CHECK MARK. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR MELISSA RENEE SALAZAR, WHITE, FEMALE, 35 YEARS OLD, 5 FEET 3 INCHES, 100 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES, IN CONNECTION WITH HER ABDUCTION. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE FRANKLIN POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 9 7 9, 8 2 8, 3 4 4 4.
